::Striker/Zenyak/Prowl/Mosquitor::

Striker ducks under a shot fired by Zenyak. The shot hits the entrance of the 
cave that Zenyak had thrown them into and several rocks fall, blocking the 
way out. Shredder looks over at Zenyak.

"To the death, Zenyak. Using swords. Use of guns would cause a cave in, and 
we'd both probably die," Striker says.

"Very well!" Zenyak says, puts his gun away, and launches himself at Shredder 
with his sword slashing.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl jumps out of the way of Mosquitor's shot. "You should really warn your 
opponent before doing that, you know?" Prowl says, firing back at Mosquitor.

The stupid bug ducks with a confused expression on his face. "We're in 
battle. Why would we warn each other?" He asks, firing back.

Prowl rolls out of the way. "Because," He says, firing a shot at Mosquitor, 
"It is good manners." Prowl grins when he sees that this is confusing the bug.

Mosquitor blink, trying to sort it all out. "But battle isn't good manners. 
Good manners in a battle are not..." He blinks again as he totaly confuses 
himself, forgets to dodge a shot from Prowl, and stumbles backward.

Prowl chuckles, firing a few more shots at Mosquitor, who rolls out of the 
way behind a boulder.
